main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Biloxi, Mississippi on 25 August 1952, characterized as a bright light moving erratically in the sky.
interesting points: The object was described as being 25 to 30 feet in diameter., The sighting lasted approximately 45 seconds., The object stopped and hovered for about 30 seconds before disappearing., Witness reported that it did not resemble known aircraft or meteors., Multiple reports of bright white lights observed over Biloxi on different dates.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: an individual with considerable experience in observing aircraft
